channel.title: Translations on Alambayana's Blog: Random walks through my mind
channel.description: Recent content in Translations on Alambayana's Blog: Random walks through my mind

item.title: Kalama Sutta
item.description: Buddha Shakyamuni is said to have started his final journey from Kesariya to his Parinirvana at Kushinagar in Nepal.

item.title: Nasadiya Sukta
item.description: Rig Veda Mandal 10 Sukta 129 (RV 10.129) Rishi: Prajapati Parameshthi Devata: Bhavavritam Translated by: Alambayana The Rig Veda is the oldest surviving literature in the Sanskrit tradition.
